1.0.name: wordpress/auto-twitter-followers-stay-informed
1.0.description: Plugin adds a check box to the Write Post editor. When this box is checked, plugin automatically tweets each new blog post with a link of course. Maximum advantage of simplicity. In the WP admin interface, set necessary keys. Automatic tweet an older articles with one click. If a post is longer than 140 characters, it will be cut down. For most of this area did not take a link to your site, supports plug and Shorten Service bit.ly Auto twitter followers stay informed plugin put your social media to autopilot.
